channel.title: Hamachi Help Please
channel.description: OK, I downloaded Hamachi and I CAN get onto servers, but theres a few questions I have. Well I don't know what the green stars and dots mean and how to tell if a server is OFFLINE or ONLIne. Also if I have to Ping or I can just put the IP in everytime.

item.title: Hamachi Help Please
item.dc:creator: @dark_paladin_lord dark paladin lord
item.description:
@dark_paladin_lord wrote:

erm… i was gonna post a topic about the same thing but there r SO many topics about this.

So can u explain that more better to me plz, im not getting it…

Read full topic

item.description:
@Amerks5 wrote:

Well that summed it up very nicely! Thanks so much!!!

Read full topic

item.title: Hamachi Help Please
item.dc:creator: @x0_0wn x0 0wn
item.description:
@x0_0wn wrote:

Ok, the answers: XD

  1. Stars do tell if they’re online or offline…
  2. Just put the IP in,
    if it doesn’t work then ping it. ( that’s what I do ) XD
    Note: If you didn’t know hamachi can be used as a messaging system.

Read full topic
